Who is so great a God as our God?
You are the God who do wonders!
Amongst the people have You made Your power known!
And I said: now have I made a beginning: this change has been wrought by the right hand of the Most High.
I have remembered the works of the Lord, and called to mind Your wonders from of old.
Our God is in heaven and on earth;
all things whatsoever He has willed, He has done.
When Israel went out of Egypt, and the house of Jacob from among a barbarous people, Judea became His sanctuary, Israel His dominion.
The sea beheld and fled, the Jordan turned back.
What ails you, O sea, that you fled? And you, O Jordan, that you turned back?
